name: DarkCorbettReport
description: A very dark theme for The Corbett Report.
additional_info:
version 0.1: initial theme release
version 0.2: added some additional background colors, changed text colors and some heading colors for better contrast
version 0.3: some additional adjustments to background colors, headings and table text
version 0.4 (14 June 2017): adjusted some input box colors, adjusted text and background colors on the RSS page
